<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Standard">[Druid](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=213)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 218 <sup>2.0</sup>

You have entered a druidic circle and learned a few of the order’s secrets, granting you primal power.

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Archetypes/Archetype_Druid.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="3">Multiclass Druid characters</title>

The druid archetype can provide a bit of healing or elemental damage and can increase your utility in a natural environment with spells like [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1680) and [_one with stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1619).

<document level="2" id="feat-5073" />
